name: King of Machines
description:
King of Machines is a mecha-themed side-scrolling beat 'em up, in a world where powered exo-suits are commonplace, and also the weapon of choice in a violent uprising.

Inspired by classic beat 'em ups like TMNT and Armored Warriors, as well as modern character action games.

name: Con Rồng Cháu Tiên
description: Loose bitsy retelling of the Vietnamese origin myth.

name: The Sims 4: Bust the Dust Kit
description: Dust off the vacuum and tidy up with The Sims 4: Bust the Dust Kit. Dust is piling up and spawning friendly bunnies and dastardly filth fiends in Sims' homes. Get rid of the muck by cleaning, or settle in for a messy life. Conquer chores with new buffs and rewards for each dust level, vacuums to help fight the good fight, and aspirations related to cleanliness.

name: Neon Warrior
description: The neon hero will have to make a journey full of dangers in a fantastic neon world. Solve puzzles and enjoy the graphics!

name: Our Red String
description:
Lena and Ian are two very different people who find themselves in a very similar moment in their lives. Both struggling to achieve their dreams, both hurting because of love. Their lives will become intertwined, with each other and with several characters that will impact who they are and who they will become.
They will be able to experience the heights of love or the depths of lust, friendship or betrayal, moral or immoral, success or failure… And you will be the one to choose. But one’s choices can often tangle together and lead to an unexpected mess, so be mindful, for you thread the thread of their Red String.

name: Watermelon Blocks
description: Live this adventure with the cute watermelon block. Solve puzzles, overcome obstacles, challenges and live adventures in this beautiful watermelon world

name: The Sims 4: Country Kitchen Kit
description: Transform your Sim's kitchen into the most charming part of their home with The Sims 4: Country Kitchen Kit. From vintage refrigerators to casserole dishes, these Build/Buy objects offer a delightfully trendy take on a timeless style.

name: Stickman Clans
description: Join a thrilling campaign of tower defense battles in Stickman Clans. You can progress through the campaign and upgrade your army to be stronger, faster, and more prepared for the next fight. That fight could be online vs other players around the world, battling hordes of endless warriors in survival mode, or the next chapter's opponents in campaign mode.

name: Introvert: A Teenager Simulator
description:
Warning: This game contains heavy material that might make players/audience uncomfortable.

This game talks about serious issues such as bullying and suicidal thoughts in a new and different way that will hopefully be interpreted better by the new generation. In this game. This project is also personal to me. It is a small universe I created to make my zone-out thoughts and stories a reality. I made this game cause I was sad so it took a while to be finished, cause you know… It’s hard to work on something when you’re sad.

name: Jurisdiction
description: Take control of a metropolitan police department and run it your way. Recruit, train, and equip officers, then send them to the streets to fight crime and keep peace in the city of Freemont.

name: Cave Bad
description: Embark on a new roguelike adventure starring Oratio the Dwarf!

name: Teamfight Manager
description: Teamfight Manager is a simulation game where you are the coach of an e-sports team. You must manage players to set them up for matches. Make the best of pick & ban by evaluating the characteristics of the champions/players! A smart strategy can make up for a lack of individual player skills.

name: Z-Race
description: Experience a new generation of racing in Z-Race, the high-octane VR arcade racer, bursting with sleek futuristic locales, high-speed zero-g gameplay, and an intense, vibrant soundtrack to really get the heart pumping! Challenge anyone and upgrade your racing ship to rocket up the global leaderboard.

name: Monster Jam Steel Titans 2
description: More Trucks! New Worlds! Monster Jam Steel Titans 2! Monster Jam Steel Titans 2 features more fan-favorite trucks in brand new Monster Jam worlds!

name: Wild Dose
description:
Wild Dose is a first-person adventure game which takes place between a cyberpunk city and virtual environments, until you start to mix both worlds.
It blends RPG, survival and psychological horror elements in a narrative-driven exploration game.

name: Neptunia: Virtual Stars
description: Neptunia Virtual Stars is an action RPG coinciding with the 10th anniversary of the Neptunia series. This game follows the CPUs as virtual idols teaming up with Mi and Yu of MEWTRAL to save planet EMO from the invaders known as "Anti".

name: Harvest Moon: One World
description:
Explore a world of new and familiar faces, unique villages and adventurous challenges, while managing your growing farm.

Harvest Moon: One World features an all-new engine and graphics, creating a brand-new way of exploring Harvest Moon for seasoned players and new generations alike.

name: Maquette
description: MAQUETTE is a first-person recursive puzzle game that takes you into a world where every building, plant, and object are simultaneously tiny and staggeringly huge.

name: Crypto Against All Odds
description: Command cryptocurrencies to fight against blockchain threats in this stylish, high-action tower defense game. Prices influence the powers of your cryptos in real time. Features squad customization, skill trees, base building, mini-games, and Endless mode. Tip: Keep calm and "HODL" the line.

name: Sword Play! Ninja Slice Runner
description:
Sharpen your blade, sword master! Dive into the world of action games where every slice is a masterpiece of power and precision. Sword Play is not just a game; it’s a duel of fate and glory set against a backdrop of breathtaking landscapes and mysterious enemies.

Welcome to Sword Play! - a marriage of cutting games and action games, a universe where each slash is a testament to the skills of the kunai master. With no need for internet, relish in the challenges of games with no wifi and embark on an epic ninja journey that knows no bounds!

Dash through numerous challenging levels, a perfect mix of slicing games and fighting games, where every enemy defeated is another step closer to becoming the ultimate slice master. With no wifi games feature, the adventure never stops; it only becomes more intense.

Feel the thrill of the sword fight, where ninja slice maneuvers and swift katana strikes rule the battlefield. Face hordes of assassins, ragdoll ninja warriors, and master the arts of ninja game strategies amidst the heat of the battle.

name: Donkey Kong Twisted Jungle
description: Sin descripción

name: The Case Book of Arne: Interlude
description:
Get a taste of Lynn and Arne's everyday life between cases!
There's a lot more to Lynn's life in the other world than you see in the main story!
Take the curious events at the Lugenberg Festival...
Unravel a new mystery in this Interlude chapter,
which takes place between Cases 1 and 2.

name: Basic Replicator
description:
Boot up your replicator console, and get to coding!

In this game you are tasked with writing BASIC code to generate voxel objects. Each challenge presents you with a new object to replicate.

Attempt to optimize your solution to minimize program size, or executed instruction count.

name: The Unending
description: The Undending is about a guy who just had an unfortunate accident and is now in a sort of repeating personal hell.

name: Oops, I said Yes?!
description:
I lived a fun and trendy life as a working woman, but after a night of drinking, I found myself married to a coworker!?

A welcome home kiss, a ring on my finger... I shouldn't feel love for a contract marriage, but why does my heart beat so fast?

An oath and a marriage registration later, can love be born from marriage?

name: Mission: Impossible Arcade
description: Agent, your mission should you choose to accept it, is to save the world by sabotaging enemy plans that aim to weaponize humanoid robots. You will have a range of weapons and high-tech gadgets at your disposal to complete your mission but remember time is not your side. Sega brings the multi-billion dollar blockbuster film franchise MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE to the amusements market. SEGA’s Mission: Impossible Arcade is an adrenaline-fueled video game, that is the pinnacle of great design and entertainment. The awe-inspiring 4 player Super Deluxe Attraction cabinet is designed to look like the IMF (Impossible Mission Force) safe house and features the iconic fuse along with various interiors details that convey the feel of a top-secret high-tech spy hideout.

name: Haiku, the Baby Robot
description: Take control of Haiku, the Baby Robot, collect battery-packs and bring them to the central battery to stop the machine world from corrupting.

name: The Creature
description:
You enter a room only to find it empty except for a window, an old mattress, and a strange creature. You are sure that its eyes just glowed brighter with life.

THE Creature is a visual novel created in Ren'Py as a personal, experimental project. There is an overall story with different endings depending on the choices.

name: Hinoken
description: Kill yourself. Learn your mistakes. Progress.

name: The Roc
description: The Chinese AVG game "Dapeng", this is an ordinary story that is neither love nor youth, but a simple life:Wu Shengyou, who came to a big city because of his parents’ work. Meet Zhou Qing,addicted to cultivation novel, a girl who can't distinguish between the virtual and the reality.

name: Pokémon Go: Season of Legends
description: The second implementation of seasons intersected with the Spring season in Northern Hemisphere and Autumn season in the Southern Hemisphere. A theme of this season is Legendary Pokémon.

name: Norroth: Online
description: A nostalgic tile-, turn- and web-based MMORPG in a vast medieval fantasy open world. Gathering spots, crafting stations and over 20 professions to master. Many different biomes and enemies to discover. Create or join a Guild and have fun in the special World Events that change every holiday.

name: Island Empire
description:
Island Empire is a turnbased strategy game that is easy to learn, but hard to master. Fight in the Campaign through challenging individual and unique level. Develop a strategy, expand your empire, ensure a stable economy,

defend you territory with walls and buy units for the war.

name: Help! I Need to Stretch Out for Valentines Day!
description: Made as a submission for Strawberry Jam 5

name: Little Rock, MI
description: You're Troy, a rundown Park Ranger in the infamous Ishskwaday State Park, in Little Rock, Michigan. You spend your Sunday nights running drinking kids off their cabins and talking to your best friend Juno over a walkie talkie. Tonight is just like any other night, except there's something on the loose. Will you find it?

name: Justice League Legacy
description: Fan game where you can play with more then 50 DC heroes and villains at classic beatnup and plataform stages.

name: Fallen London: The Thing That Came in from the Fog
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for March, 2021.

name: The Law
description:
Tomorrow a new decisive bill is going to be examined in the the Cabinet of Ministers, and many things are at stake. You control all the characters involved.
Game is short but not sweet. Proudly political.
Short game born at the Global Game Jam 2019. Play in English or Italian.

name: Attack of the Murder Hornets
description: A short retro pixel horror game based on Attack of The Murder Hornets, a film by Michael Paul Stephenson.

name: A Twisted Place
description: Depressing Cosmic Horror

name: Violeta
description: You are Mo, the cat! Be cute, listen to and advise your friends, and knock some plants over if you feel like it.

name: Siren Head Resurrection
description: A group of young cave divers went missing. The local ranger does not respond to radio calls. The park is quite away from civilization and there is no one in the area. A storm will hit the valley in the coming hours and the whole area will be covered with thick fog. You have to act fast.

name: Omniblast
description: Blast off through space, dodge asteroids, and beat bosses!

name: Skyfall
description: Play an exciting 2D old-school RPG in the classic style of Valiant - Resurrection by the same developers.

name: The Lost Valley
description: Lightning killed your plane near an unknown continent.

name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack 2
description: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Flandre Scarlet, Komeji Koishi, Aki Minoriko, Tsukumo Yatsuhashi and Yorigami Jyoon. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack 4
description: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Ibuki Suika, Ibaraki Kasen, Shikieiki, Hinanawi Tenshi and Hata no Kokoro. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

name: Pesky Humans
description: Pesky Humans is a real-time, top-down, point-and-click sci-fi shooter. It is single player, with setting-appropriate music unique to each difficulty level. Talkative Ship AIs respond to players actions, spoken in English but subtitled for other languages.

name: Quick Square
description: Quick Square is a bright hardcore puzzle platformer.

name: Space Cube Tower Defense
description: You control a space station in the form of a cube that protects the planet from invaders.

name: Textreme 2
description: A fully functional text editor topped with lots of juicy animations and effects that exaggerate your every action.

name: Wheelie King Online
description: 'Wheelie King Online' is a realistic wheelie bike game for everyone. Our freestyle stunts app lets you wheelie race anywhere. Try the challenge of nitro bike drift game or upgrade, and customise your bike with paint and decals.

name: Gear Tunnel
description: Moving all the time is your only chance to survive. How long can you move?

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla + Immortals Fenyx Rising Bundle
description: This bundle includes two Ubisoft games: Assassin's Creed Valhalla and Immortals Fenyx Rising.

name: Sakura Succubus 4
description: Ogasawara Hiroki was once an ordinary man, until numerous beautiful succubi fell for him in droves, and soon he obtained quite the harem! After narrowly escaping a lifetime of imprisonment in the succubus realm, Hiroki is ready to kick back and relax. Idol succubus Ayu invites him on a vacation to her private beach house in Okinawa, and Hiroki is happy to oblige. The other succubi come along for the ride, and a week of summertime fun begins. Join Hiroki as he breaks up vicious pillow fights, teaches social media queen Cosmos how to swim, and (begrudgingly) goes jogging with tennis athlete Hazel, all the while deepening his bonds with his adoring harem.

name: Puzlkind: Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Multiplayer jigsaw puzzles with voice chat! Play with original art puzzles on your own or while you laugh, learn, and love with fellow Earthlings.

name: Survivor Dieland
description: You're gonna get yourself killed being out here all by your lonesome... There's monsters on this island! Besides, It's not always the beasts you should be afraid of... Beasts are easy to predict. They just want to kill and eat you. Humans are much harder... They'll pretend to be your friend first...

name: Park Walk
description: Park walk is a shooting first person game, which tells the story of adventure in the wild. When you are surrounded by zombies on the way to adventure, you need to pick up all kinds of guns and kill zombies!

name: Oculux
description: A relaxing puzzle game with a beautiful and immersive atmosphere to sharpen your mind.

name: 斗魂大陆
description: Sin descripción

name: Destroy the Cubes
description: Destroy the Cubes is a minimalist puzzle game that combines balls, cubes and physical intuition. You need to throw the balls in the right direction and position to destroy all the cubes at once. You move to the next level when enough balls fall into the hole.

name: Cavebound
description: Cavebound is a fun survival co-op/single player game! In Cavebound, the goal is to keep an underground mine up and running while avoiding a deadly monster. You can play by yourself or with up to 3 other players.

name: One Pixel
description: 2D platform game with minimalist pixel art graphics, create platforms and shoot a lot to defeat an army with more than 1,000 monsters. The game was made for people who like a challenge and don't mind dying several times.

name: Powerslide Legends
description: Try to make the powerslide world record on 13 different roads or enjoy the padal to the metal with your friends or other players in multiplayer sessions.

name: Tower of Doom
description: Tower of Doom is a VR arcade shooter in which the player has to survive multiple waves of enemies in different levels. Each round the player gets to choose one out of four auto-generated guns in order to move up the highscoreboard and make it to the next stage.

name: Asteroids Maneuvers
description: Maneuver through Asteroids and collect Juice!

name: Spirit Clash
description: Blockchain card game on the Enjin platform. Do you have what it takes?

name: Retention: A Love Story
description: A short puzzle game with a big story to tell. Dive in to reveal the mysteries of Amy's past.

name: Carnal Instinct
description: Carnal Instinct is an Adult RPG with an emphasis on AAA quality visuals and compelling erotic interaction. You enter the world of Sabu a slave, but will forge your own destiny and shape the world itself in this realm of ancient gods, mythical creatures, and boundless lust.

name: Battle of Hunters: Beast Zone
description: Battle of Hunters: Beast Zone is a Battle Royale game for up to 28 players. Solo play, duo match (two-player team), and squad (four-player team) also available. and you can learn various martial arts skills. You can also tame multiple beasts to fight together.

name: CitronRapide
description: CitronRapide is a French multiplayer browser-based quick game. Answer questions, rate your opponents and gain lemons!

name: Starry Flowers
description: STARRY FLOWERS is a visual novel about two witch boys falling in love.

name: Abyssopelagia
description: A short game about an octopus named Ophelia exploring the depths of the ocean in search of little fish to eat.

name: Ven Games
description: Classic party games of drawing, guessing and word play! Browser based and make for all platforms.

name: Stories of Liane
description: 300 years into the future: Earth is uninhabitable. Only the most powerful have escaped searching for a new home for humanity. Stories of Liane is an experimental experience that explores the narrative and visuals of a dark dystopian atmosphere through multiple different perspectives and settings. This is a collection of stories from several characters to explore humanity's future in this dark future.

name: Fuelin.io
description:
Fuelin.io is a 2D Top down Racing Game! This is a remake of the old game Driftin.io Just as Driftin.io, Fuelin.io has classes such as Driftin.io such as Racer, Bully, Flash, Slime etc. 
Just hop in a game, play with your friends and have fun!

name: Red Handed
description:
A stealth game where you have to get caught

Made in under 3 days for the Wowie game jam where the theme was " Failure is progress "

name: A Walk, the Morning After the Storm
description: There's a story people tell around here.

name: PixelJunk Raiders
description: SOS! Tantal is under attack by fiendish aliens bent on harvesting the population's life force! Shake off that hypersleep and slash, smash, raid and rescue your way through hundreds of unique missions, all while unraveling the mystery of the enigmatic Keepers. Use State Share to share stages with the turrets, mines and other imprints you've left behind, or jump into another mercenary's stage and use their imprints to your strategic advantage.

name: Gloam
description: In Gloam, the player embodies a small candle which must in order to survive, steal light from other players. The confrontation is done via mini-games of logic and speed. The last of the 10 participants to still have the light wins.

name: A Sleeper's Quest: A Labyrinth to Thee
description: A Sleeper's Quest: A Labyrinth to Thee is a simple, unique and difficult 3D Maze Platformer that requires platforming precision, patience and memorization.

name: Swords & Bones
description: Swords & Bones inherits the spirit of the great 16-bit classics from the 80s and 90s, enriching the game experience with modern mechanics! Undead hordes and demons await you in this epic adventure!

name: Cyber Emoji Tale 2099
description: Cyber Emoji Tale 2099 is a classic RPG with elements of a graphic novel, set in an open rail world with a system of hardcore real-time battles, in the universe of the near future.

name: Tortured Hearts: Or How I Saved the Universe. Again.
description: Single player, fantasy RPG with turn-based combat and non-linear story. Conversation driven: 512 k words of dialog and 300 k words of other text. Combat with or without a party, using martial styles (melee, bare handed, ranged) or magic (arcane, divine, bardic, psionic). Plus crafting.

name: The Frost Rebirth
description: First person shooter in which you need to search for weapons, food, equipment and explore the territory of the mountains. There are only two main tasks, survive and find your way home. You need to look for clues that will lead you out of this area.

name: Hollow Witch
description: The witch woke up! She feels hollow and must gather magic, evolve and overcome the trials. Honor the memories of her equals fighting and absorbing mystic souls reaching an unmatched power! Consume or be consumed, what will be the fate!

name: Do I smell Pizza?
description: The pizza arrived but Chubboy DOESN'T SHARE FOOD! Delivery noise wakes your food junky uninvited family and sniffing rats! Throw extremely healthy food to nauseate them. Go fast or get eaten in this FOOD HELL SHOOTER Tower Defense.

name: Space Choice: Data Analyzer
description: A little experimental game about making many choices quickly. Pick from 3 options, then do it again, and again, and again... Make the best out of a bad situation. Do it as quickly as you can because time is the most valuable resource at your disposal.

name: Around the Clock at Bikini Bottom
description: Around the Clock at Bikini Bottom is a first-person low-poly survival horror parody based off of the hit TV series, "SpongeBob SquarePants," and the returning wrath of the Jelliens. Explore over 16 hand-crafted locations based in Bikini Bottom, created with a touch of the Dave Microwaves Games aesthetic. Play as your favorite characters, including the sponge himself, Patrick, Squidward, and Mr. Krabs.

name: ShooterBall
description: ShooterBall is a physics first person shooter basketball and football/soccer multiplayer videogame where you need aim to manipulate the ball! it feels like playing real basketball but with guns!!

name: Micro Annihilation
description: Micro Annihilation is a real-time strategy where your battlefields are inside homes, offices, and everything in between. Airlift troops onto the dining room table, launch artillery across the bedroom, and bring down the house while waging war upon a new mysterious foe.

name: Zadette
description:
Zadette is a parody of the 80s arcade games, where the heroes were muscular, where the graphics quality of a game was judged by the size of the sprites and where the strident music of the audio chips punctuated the levels.

Despite its unique aesthetic, Zadette offers a real challenge. To complete the adventure you will need to familiarize yourself with its old-fashioned mechanics, get used to controlling a disproportionate character, and learn to take advantage of its lunar jumps and devastating sword strike.

name: Chumlee's Adventure: The Quest for Pinky
description: Chumlee's Adventure: The Quest for Pinky is a brand new, authentic game created for the Nintendo Entertainment System. Taking inspiration from NES games of old, Chumlee's Adventure: The Quest for Pinky is a platformer adventure game where you'll face off against the friends you know and love from Pawn Stars, the hit TV show as seen on the History Channel. This game is an official release, incorporating their direct input and made in conjunction with the show's stars and producers.

name: Daybringer
description: Enter a Urban Fantasy Epic which follows the journey of a boy in a hip-hop purgatory.

name: Shutter Nyang
description: Shutter Nyang is challenging Platformer Action game. The players play as the ‘Cat’ whom got separated from his friend, a little girl. Using mystical camera, create your own unique imagination to help the ‘Cat’ get back to his friend. Nyang! Nyang! Nyang!

name: Master of Wills
description: A strategy card game set in the cyberpunk city of Novus. Players battle as Faction leaders in a tug of war to influence Community members to join their side. Craft Faction card decks from a collection of characters and powers to outplay opponents. Choose a side and become the Master of Wills!

name: 6Souls
description:
6Souls is a challenging action-platformer with over 80 levels to beat and 6 bosses to defeat. Embark on an exciting journey to find the abandoned Clifford Castle and uncover its secrets!
Our heroes, adventure enthusiasts Jack and his faithful dog companion Butch, go on an exciting quest to find an abandoned castle where the entire Clifford family vanished years ago. The whole castle is surrounded by mystery, from its dark dungeons to its highest towers.
While discovering new rooms, our heroes will learn fascinating details about the Clifford family, meet the castle’s peculiar residents and uncover its secrets.

name: Fade: A Ghost Story
description: 'Fade - A Ghost Story' is the story of a ghost who travels back through time to try and get back it's lost memories. This short game was made in a week for the GJL Game Parade Spring 2021.

name: Love in Lockdown: Ella version
description:
Visual novel by Melancholy Marionette.

7 different endings depending on your choices
Casual choices and choices with consequences
The option to rename ELLA and name yourself
Gender-neutral - ELLA will refer to you by your chosen name + 'you' and 'they'
Full (terrible) British voice acting with 2 different voice options to choose from
Mild adult content

name: Transubstantiation Synthesis
description:
This game is horny for drones, robots, mind/body control, and the future.

Transubstantiation Synthesis is a work of futurology. What will the world of tomorrow look like? Which trends are currently in place, and what do they mean for us?

name: KawaiiDungeon: Rise of a Goddess
description: Learn Japanese for free with KawaiiDungeon! KawaiiDungeon will help you to learn Japanese faster while reading and remembering hiragana, katakana and vocabulary in a fun and interactive way!

name: Kokorowa Onigiri Delivery
description: A doujin game based on Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin, developed by Desunoya.

name: Hungry
description: A short dolphin adventure.

name: Cybernetic Moon Horse 2071
description: Cybernetic Moon Horse 2071 is an endless galloper that randomises itself on and throughout each run, the results of each randomisation evolve over time.

name: Follow the blackbird
description: Follow the blackbird is a hand-drawn 2d game made in a form of comics with lovely watercolour illustrations. Follow the heart-warming story about little adventrure of Sonya and the blackbird. As the story unfolds, couple of light puzzles will be on your way.

name: Sunken Sailor
description: Sin descripción

name: Rugida
description: The girl ended up in the dungeons. And although her heart is now barely beating, she still hopes to get her soul back. The dungeon is just the beginning of the journey. And it is already teeming with everything that can be teeming with. Will you help her on this difficult journey?

name: Rhythium
description: Rhythium is an intense, high-tempo rhythm game with challenging combo-based gameplay. With a classic 4 key system along with an amazing range of original indie electronic music.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Japan 2
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Star Steel
description: "Star Steel" is a vertical scrolling shooter with a top view. Defend our planet from deadly alien forces.

name: Kojou
description: You and your friends are staying in Kojou castle for a night - but one of you is a killer. Find them before the night breaks - or fail and be forced to choose between running or hiding to stay alive..

name: Raging Ball
description: First finish the game, then improve your speed.

name: Booobjz
description: You have to solve puzzles and switch gravity.

name: Guns of Succubus
description: You will play as Nico, a kind-hearted boy, using an assault rifle transformed by a succubus called Millfeuijonk, You can enjoy high-speed "Bullet Hell" when you dodging the enemy's bullets coming from all directions.

name: Active Mummy
description: Active Mummy is a side-scrolling platformer with addicting gameplay.

name: Armed Emeth
description: Valess, a boy earning petty cash in a commune of drifters is suddenly met by Lock, a stand-alone golem. Valess' mother was kidnapped by a terrorist organization, and upon discovering that the leader of that organization has an enormous bounty on his head, Valess receives a golem of his own from Lock and decides to join him on an adventure into the unknown where numerous bounties await. Thus begins their journey of grit and oil across several continents!

name: Missing
description: Take a picture of your missing girlfriend scattered inside the school and collect it. But be careful not to make eye contact with ghosts.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Lafond Regional Railway
description: Lafond regional railway is a 20 mile railway in the semi- prairie area in Canada. The route offers open farm fields, and a scenic line to Clearwater, and makes extensive use of TurfFX and other new features.

name: The Lost Night
description: You wake up in the middle of a spooky town trying to find your way back home. Help the citizens of this weird town and they will open paths for you.

name: Domino Killer
description: Domino is a board game in which a chain of dice is built, in contact with halves with the same number of dots. This game has two game modes: player vs. AI and AI vs. AI.

name: Pokémon Beekeeper
description:
Pokémon Beekeeper is a Pokémon fan game. It is not a ROM hack, but rather an RPG Maker XP game. It is a resource management game where you own an apiary.
You and Herdier farm honey and sell it in the nearby city.
Use that money to buy more nests, upgrade your team, or stimulate the bees!
The hook: You have 9 days to get enough money to pay off your rent!
Get enough money, and become a multi-millionaire from selling honey!

name: Lightblue
description:
An ancient legend, a shattered family, an exorcist priest.

lightblue is a first person survival horror game. You are Father Gabriel, an exorcist priest with the task of putting an end to the weird paranormal events that take place in Prettymountain Lake, the small village home of the famous legend about a strange albino girl with light blue hair mysteriously disappeared.

name: Spiky
description:
Spiky is a "lose and try again" type of game, you will have to create a path for Spiky, through obstacles, using items available in your inventory. 
16 levels + 1 final level are available. (Levels are getting bigger and harder).

name: Hamster All-Stars
description: Horse betting is out: hamster betting is in. Build crazy race tracks for cute hamsters, then bet on who will to earn credits. Use these credits to unlock all kinds of cool objects, like bumpers, funnels & tubes.

name: Take the Throne
description: Take the Throne is a new Massive Multiplayer Online Battle Royale game with up to 30 players in a free-for-all bloody fight to be crowned and take the throne! Take the Throne is built on PvP encounters and is filled with comedic physics-based gameplay.

name: Wall Force
description: Wall Force is a multiplayer sidescroller shooter game that lets you make your way to the top of the leaderboard inside a beautiful wall-like world. Unlock different weapons and expand your arsenal with your favorite weapons and modify them to get the best performance.

name: Crepitations
description: Old town, autumn season recreation.

name: Bionicle: Kanohi Klash
description: A fanmade 1-on-1 fighting game based on the Bionicle toyline from Lego.

name: The Man, the Alien, and the AI
description:
This is the story of a young woman who comes across an extraterrestrial AI. The AI's entire function is to slowly rewrite the mind of whoever it has bonded to. The only ones who could separate them are on a distant planet called Valley 7. Now this woman must get to Valley 7 and separate the AI from her mind. But the AI seems to have become quite intrigued with her. And there's that dashing alien rogue hunting her down. And their childhood friend who keeps following her everywhere.

What a mess she's gotten herself in to!

name: FroggieChat
description: A faithful remake of Pictochat for Windows and Android

name: Nova Odessa: The Strange Tower
description: Nova Odessa: The Strange Tower is an action/adventure roguelike where you play as a demon hunter lost in a haunted tower. Explore the tower and find new weapons and items to fight demons.

name: Lisa and the Grimoire
description: Hoping to hit a big payday and pull herself from a life of poverty, Lisa heads to a town with a rumored demonic artifact. But upon arriving, she quickly realizes she has gotten herself into a dangerous situation.

name: Foglight Online
description: Foglight Online is a multiplayer horror survival game. One player plays as the Legendary Farberto, a monster with a bloodhounds nose, that can smell the other players. The other players have to hide or fight back in this intense nail-biting multiplayer experience!

name: Puzzle Car
description: A minimalist and relaxing experience. Challenge yourself to move pieces to assemble a safe path for your car and collect all the items on the way, while listening to a relaxing soundtrack in a totally minimalist environment.

name: Wartune Reborn
description: "Wartune Reborn" epic magic TBS game was developed by 7Road Wartune Workshop. The game shows the magnificent god-devil battlefields of Cloud City with military organization, runes, sylphs awakening, skills, castles construction and wild exploration!

name: Adorable Girls
description: Relaxing puzzle game with adorable girls

name: XPock
description: Shoot, Fly, Open, Win. Shoot the aliens, avoid obstacles and dodge the bullets in order to get the achievements you deserve.

name: The Hardest Game in the Universe
description: Why are you getting to know one of the most difficult games in the universe, Embark on this challenge with the new casual game, platform that aims to become one of the games most hated for its difficulty,

name: Minicraft Shooter
description: Minicraft Shooter is an epic time killer shooter with a top view in which you face an endless crowd of zombies, in the scenery of a cyberpunk metropolis, a modern city and a green forest. and all this in a cubic style!

name: My Dear Frankenstein
description:
“Come. While the darkness is still welcoming...”

“My Dear Frankenstein” is a point-and-click adventure visual novel produced by the indie Japanese circle Number7 and localised by Moonchime Studios.

As a newborn little monster, the protagonist will have to explore the City of Shipberry at night and search for the pieces of his heart that got scattered all around it. Players will get to delve into universal themes like life, friendship and grief through his experiences in this emotional quest.

Content warnings: suicide, cruelty, references to death and the occult.

name: Project Entertainment System
description: Play as the Grim Reaper in an FPS that draws huge inspiration from Retro FPS mechanics. You'll fight your way through the levels funded by the souls of your enemies where one bullet could be the difference between a well deserved victory or a broken 'R' key.

name: Rising Noracam
description: Climb the ruins to get the legendary treasure that is at the top. The control is very simple, but one mistake will cause you to fall and keep falling. Game of that type

name: Start From School
description: Control the enemy on your PC screen by moving the player with your mouse, carry out various actions, and defeat enemies in this shooting-style game. (Comes with a tutorial for game controls)

name: And the Band Begins to Play
description: On a song, a quarantine, and a new child.

name: Minecraft Lovehunt
description: Minecraft Lovehunt is a free-to-play visual novel that was made to celebrate Valentine's Day with the Dream Team fanbase! With 9 endings to go through, I sure hope you're in for a ride.

name: Start Again: A Prologue
description: A small RPG in which players must guide Siffrin, who is stuck in a time loop.

name: Daedalus Demise
description:
In Daedalus Demise you're trapped in an endless maze. Going deeper into this dungeon is your only hope. Be fast to exit each floor and try to go as deep as possible!

Your goal in this action-adventure game is to reach the deepest floor! At each floor you have to find a key and the exit. You can also get some pickaxes, maps, and even a compass along the way to help you, but be quick, since on each floor, you are on a timer!

name: Ascii the Brave Cat
description: Ascii the Brave Cat is a retro-style 2D action game with awesome new mechanics, cute characters, and memorable gameplay. Meet the never seen puzzles, collect upgrade items, fight creative funny bosses, and push yourself beyond the limit to save someone (or something) you love.

name: Spring Flower
description: Spring Flower is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Urtuk: The Desolation
description: Urtuk is an open world, tactical turn-based RPG in a low-fantasy setting. Guide your band of adventurers through the ruins of an ancient world. Recruit new followers, loot the corpses of your fallen foes, and do your best to survive in this harsh and unforgiving realm.

name: Alex Kidd 3: Curse in Miracle World
description: Alex Kidd 3: Curse in Miracle World is a hack of Alex Kidd in Miracle World (1986) for the Sega Master System created by Yéti Bomar that modifies the Sega game to turn it into a sequel with new levels.

name: Amnesia Re-collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Snake
description: Snake is a homebrew version of the arcade game developer for the SG-1000.

name: Eddie's World
description:
Venture through Tockin island as Eddie to recover stolen E-Tanks!

This game features Mega man styled gameplay mixed with puzzles and unusual boss fights.
8 standard and 1 special levels to complete and a big hub full of puzzles to explore.

Made with Megamix Engine.

name: Plants vs. Zombies: Back to the Roots
description: Plants vs Zombies: Back To The Roots is a free, independently made fangame in the style of classic PVZ.

name: Prison Architect: Nintendo Switch Edition - Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Jetpack Joyride 2
description: Barry returns in a frantic adventure. In this case, he will have new equipment and weapons to fight new enemies and make his way through the laboratory to stop the scientists' experiments before it is too late. The evolved adventure of Jetpack Joyride with new HD graphics, new animations, new mechanics and a new way of playing.

name: After School Girlfriend
description:
It’s a new year at Souin High, and you’re passing the time the only way you know how—hiding away at the back of the class.

However, when you’re asked to help improve a simple poster, your perfect plans for a quiet high school life are dashed as you’re appointed campaign manager for the most unlikely student council president in the whole school…

After a disastrous start to the campaign, can you gain the support of the rest of the student body, or are you destined to sit on the sidelines forever?

name: Lillyann
description: One day, I was hit by a carriage and... I died. But why did I wake up in another world and take over the life of this girl named Ann? She was a terrible person, who bullied her classmate. "I think he hates me and I can't blame him, but I'm not going to regret it because I didn't do the bad things. After a while, he will realize that I am no longer a threat to him and will ignore me." Or that's what I thought at the time. But I was completely wrong.

name: Omen of Rain
description: You play as Hans, who, after fifteen years, has returned to the old hideout where he used to play with his friends.

name: Tong Jyun
description: a little chat about cooking & culture.

name: Neon
description: Spin jump and solve puzzles.

name: SpaceNet: A Space Adventure
description: SpaceNet is a non-linear retro sci-fi adventure. Less graphics, more story! Along with an amazing soundtrack and a really atmospheric soundscape, the minimalist graphics allows a deeper immersion into the story.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 5
description: Spend a sensational summer vacation helping rangers run Pinecreek Hills National Park. It’s centennial year and the park is bigger and better than ever. Enjoy this outstanding collection of Hidden Object scenes and puzzles set in an idyllic national park. As well as finding Hidden Objects around the park you will need to perform your duties as a park ranger. Protect the environment by collecting all the bonus trash items to recycle and catalogue all the wildlife throughout the park in your wildlife Journal.

name: Flipol
description: Flip and color it all. It is a simple puzzle game.

name: Transformers: Battlegrounds - Shattered Spacebridge
description: Help the Autobots rebuild the Spacebridge back to Cybertron - all while battling the evil Decepticons - in a multi-dimensional adventure with countless paths home!

name: Paranormal Bundle
description:
This bundle includes three amazing adventure games from Artifex Mundi:
- Demon Hunter: Revelation
- Dreamwalker: Never Fall Asleep
- Scarlett Mysteries: Cursed Child

name: Elder Puzzle
description: Elder Puzzle - A puzzle game with classic game modes, dozens of levels and beautiful pictures made in the pixel-art style, in this game you can train your quick thinking and reaction, collecting puzzles into a single picture, choosing the difficulty level for your style of play.

name: Visiting a Celebrity
description: Imagine yourself as a journalist traveling the homes of the world's most popular people. Get passports to fly from country to country. Earn gold to buy everything you need.

name: 玛法传奇
description: Sin descripción

name: Attack of the Petscii Robots
description:
Sometime in the future, robots attempt to take over human settlements on various planets. Your goal is to infiltrate these settlements and destroy all of the robots.

To do this, you’ll need to locate weapons and other tools...

name: Viking Story
description: Viking Story - is a classic 2D platformer where you play as a Viking girl on various levels collecting things you need, fighting to enemies.

name: Sanae Toumaden X
description: A mega X Touhou fangame with no X.

name: MoGu's Adventure
description: This is a 2D pixel-style platform jumping game where players play as the main character MoGu in an exciting adventure.

name: Pavlov's House
description: Take control of the valiant defenders of a Soviet strongpoint in Stalingrad as they hold out against constant German attacks for almost two months. Can you rise to the challenge of mounting odds and hold Pavlov’s House?

name: Cube Clones
description:
A 3D block puzzle with a beautiful world view that makes full use of "clone".
Immerse yourself in a fantastic world and immerse yourself in elaborate puzzles.

name: Lumexa
description: Lumexa is a Connecting Points Puzzle-game that involves you in a minimalist atmosphere. Enjoy the neon lights and the good vibes in a delightful experience only with hexagon blocks.

name: 100 Hidden Snails 2
description: Hidden object game in a surreal style. Extremely hard!

name: Tripill
description: Puzzle game with planning elements, 300 levels, many hours of fun. The game is to collect pills. You are controlling three viruses , each of them can only move in one way. You can combine them together to move in different directions.

name: STAY
description: Welcome to STAY, a Special Test of Attention Yield. Will you survive long enough?

name: Dr. Oil
description: This is a classic 2D hardcore platformer in which you have to constantly die in order to advance and kill the most evil seagull in the world.

name: Lotus Bloom
description: Lotus Bloom is a relaxing minimalist puzzle game. Connect orbs, generate energy and make flowers bloom.

name: Ninety Days
description: Ninety Days is a Tower Defense game where the player defends his tower, improving it from the amount of gold coins earned, building defense and attack upgrades to hold back waves of enemies, archers, swordsmen, giants, catapults and evil ravens for 90 days.

name: The Perfect Tower II
description: The Perfect Tower II is a mix between an incremental and a tower defense game. Build a town and explore a variety of regions to unlock different mini-games and tons of upgrades.

name: Pixel Combat
description: This is a 2D pixel adventure game. You can choose one of the two heroes to start your adventure. The level room and scene elements in the game world are randomly generated. You can experience different feelings every time you enter.

name: CooKing
description: 8 menus are included in the game, each of which will accommodate 10-12 dishes, accompanied by at least 200 ingredients. All menus take place in the cuisine of different nations. We will turn around e.g. American, French, Hungarian, Italian lands of flavors.

name: My Coloring Book
description: Restore your sense of childhood magic and wonder with My Coloring Book! With this handy app, you can find plenty of drawings that will come to life, but only with your help. Thanks to an amazing variety, My Coloring Book is suitable for all from children to adults. Younger kids will love the fun cartoon drawings while parents can spend some time relaxing with complex geometric pieces (like colorful mandalas). Save your work for later and show off your artistic sense and skill to family and friends.

name: Dat Gaem
description: Dat Gaem is a crazy take on a classic JRPG genre. Play as a group of special agents and defeat the evil that has robbed people of a peaceful life. You also need to recover... soy milk. Features: In the game, you do not level up by killing enemies scattered on the map. You gain strength by collecting soy milk and equipment upgrades scattered around the map. The game is filled with crazy humour and lot of jokes. You fight enemies is in the classic JRPG style - many bosses awaits you! Are you ready for a unforgettable experience?

name: Infernum Peak
description: Infernum Peak is a horizontal platformer with two modes: Levels and Arcade Game.

name: Berserker
description:
Side scroller game with story-driven elements, based in old Viking age before all known written sagas and scripts, we follow Asbjorn as he must save and protect what he cares the most for.

This game is violent and has zero respect for the bad guys. You, as Asbjorn who is retired Viking warrior, blessed by gods with Rage rune which he must control and use only when needed are stuck in the situation nobody want´s to be. He must use his axe and shield or axes to reach out of situation he did not want to be in.

name: Wild-9
description: Wild-9 is a short robot cowboy adventure. You crash on a donut shaped asteroid and when you wake up, you notice some of your ship parts are stolen. On top of that, severe heat is damaging your systems. How will you ever be able to survive this mess?

name: Hani
description: Hani is a Roguelike game that explores dungeons by combining various skills and artifacts.

name: CrossCode: A New Home
description:
A new chapter of Leas story awaits. The CrossWorlds just got bigger and that means there are new things to explore. But before you enjoy these, make sure to meet old friends, learn new words and throw an uncountable amount of balls at your enemies.

A New Home continues right after the Events of CrossCode and offers more of what you learned to love already: A story rich experience filled up with tons of enemies, bosses and puzzles. Follow Lea on her journey figuring out the truth, use your elements like never before and don't forget to finish the raid. This time for real.

name: Airstrife: Assault of the Aviators
description: Use different planes with upgradable parts and numerous weapons you can mount to your planes to destroy your enemies. Discover the world's beautiful atmosphere while fighting experienced Aviators. Fly solo or play with your friends and enjoy local coop. A modern re-invented classic.

name: Playground VR
description: Playground VR It is an open-world game where you can experience the beautiful essence of VR. Do you want to fly a balloon? Fly! Are you not afraid to be cured of cannon? Launch yourself! Do you want to take to the sea waves? Swim! Do you want to climb the building? Free way! Yes, you can do it all!

name: North Modding Company: Bergsbruk
description: Bergsbruk lets you mine gold, crush gravel, build roads, tunnes or just play around with heavy equipment but they will breakdown and need repairs.

name: The Caregiver
description: The Caregiver is a psychological Japanese horror adventure game about a caregiver.

name: Hero Among Us
description: Hero Among Us is a strategy/manager game were you create your own super hero, define where in the globe he/she will appear and manage how the world reacts to your actions and decisions.

name: Koi Farm
description:
Koi Farm is a game about playing with koi ponds. Explore an infinite number of procedurally generated koi patterns by crossbreeding your fish, and discover new mutations as you go along.

Create beautiful koi through selective breeding, combine fish with interesting patterns and colors to refine them.

Store the best koi as collectible trading cards, and let the koi book guide you towards new undiscovered mutations.

name: BoomBox
description: Drum to the rhythm of the music in VR with Pupa the cat! Visit beautiful environments, play with friends in multiplayer, easily download community levels, and unlock items through challenges to customize your cat and your experience in Boombox!

name: Oona the Druid's Path
description: Join the young druid Oona in an adventure to complete her first task to become a full druid. Travel through thick forests and swamps, face the creatures inhabiting them, reach the Cloud Kingdom and fight against the evil Meiga in this beautiful 2.5D platformer game.

name: Baobabs Mausoleum: Grindhouse Edition
description: CONTAINS ALL EPISODES! Follow Watracio Walpurgis, our fresh eggplant FBI agent, in this arc of three chapters that unifies the universe of Celery Emblem’s Jacob Jazz on the ultimate Baobabs Masoleum Grindhouse Edition.

name: Horror Squad
description: Horror Squad is a 1-4 player online co-op horror game. Assemble your squad to clear the areas cursed by terrifying creatures.

name: Pear Potion
description: A cute little metroidvania with challenging combat and witchcraft.

name: Shop Tycoon: Prepare Your Wallet
description: Do you want to create a Game Store? Vodka store? Sex shop? Yes, Sex shop or a small shop with alcohol? Or maybe everything together like Supermarket? Welcome to Shop Tycoon - where dreams come true.

name: Warehouse Tycoon
description: Warehouse Tycoon is a business management game in which you control all parts of your warehouse: Buying/selling products, designing your warehouse, managing employees, and most importantly making a profit.

name: Flowers Blooming at the End of Summer
description: A cinematic visual novel about a ghost girl who appears in front of a boy to help her. Find out touching stories behind the girl's mysterious and colorful past.

name: Hot Brass
description: Think before you shoot—all shots are fatal. As an elite SWAT operator, master a series of missions while arresting criminals and saving lives. Don’t just be the best, be the best of the best.

name: The Final Earth 2
description: The Final Earth 2 is a vertical city builder in space. Earth is unlivable, so you decide to create a space colony. Gather resources, then build and research your way to a better future! Grow your city from an exploration ship to a huge metropolis, full of advanced technology. What will you build?

name: Baobabs Mausoleum: Country of Woods & Creepy Tales
description:
Go crazy in this 8-bit retro adventure set in Flamingo's Creek, a ghost town that only appears every 25 years on the Albatro’s Road and immerse yourself in the most out-of-touch, alienated neighborhood community you will ever know.

Steal, fight, negotiate, solve puzzles... Anything goes to find Daphne and get out of that cursed town that will be kept, forever, inside your brain as one of the selected nightmares ever created.

name: Rhythm Doctor
description: Save patients with your rhythm mastery! Rhythm Doctor is a rhythm game where you heal patients by defibrillating in time to their heartbeats. Learn each patient's unique heartbeat and defeat boss viruses trying to sabotage your rhythm, all set to heart-pumping, soul-soothing music.

name: Pikmin Wars
description: Sin descripción

name: The Shark's Bathhouse
description:
A megaman-like platformer for the strawberry jam 5.
A Fox is on a mission to defeat the big bad shark daddy at his steamy bathhouse.
He'll need to jump, cum and hump his way to victory! And you're here to help him!
Or he can fail at the last minute and face the consequences

name: Stimulants
description: A small compilation consisting of 5 speedmaps, each playable from pistol start and involving challenging gameplay scenarios.

name: Tomatomania!
description: A stressful errand sends Doomguy into a reality-destroying anxiety spiral. Old sights and familiar foes meld in a haze that can only be described as... TOMATOMANIA!

name: Initial D: The Arcade
description: Initial D The Arcade is the latest title in the Initial D arcade game series, which has been running in arcades across Japan since 2002. In this title, not only have the graphics and operability evolved, but for the first time in the series, "In-store 4-unit battles" have been introduced, allowing players to enjoy a variety of battles, from 1 vs 1 to 1 vs 3 multiplayer battles. Furthermore, in the Story Mode, which was created using the original manga as its motif, a unique visual expression called 'manga shader' allows players to enjoy heated battles with the original characters as if they were playing in the world of the manga.

name: Maybe: Interactive Stories - Own My God
description: Own My God is an original maybe series. "Which god will you choose?" A mysterious golden apple gives you the right to choose the next King of the Gods. Instead of deciding, you say you’ll choose the god you fall in love with! Kind, Dangerous, or Boyishly Charming? Who will you choose?!

name: Planet Coaster: Vintage & World's Fair Bundle
description: Take your coaster park to the next level with this incredible bundle containing four new coasters, six new rides, and over 600 scenery items! Experience the golden oldies with the Vintage Pack, and celebrate global culture with the World's Fair Pack.

name: G-Mode Archives 31: Irekae IQ Crossword DX
description:
Let's replace the letters and align the words!

A new sense of crossword puzzle that makes the pleasure of filling become a habit.

If you know the words that enter each square from the vertical and horizontal hints, replace the letters!

"Irekae IQ Crossword DX" is a crossword puzzle you play by replacing panels.

If multiple words are completed with a single replacement, you will get a high score!
In addition, the player's IQ level is judged according to the time required to clear and the score.
There are three types of game modes: "World Mode" that clears the stage within the time limit, "IQ Test Mode" that determines the player's IQ level, and "Free Mode" that solves problems without worrying about the time limit.

You can participate in each national ranking with your score and IQ index.

name: Gods of Almagest
description:
Gods of Almagest is a 2d/3d shooter/strategy game, it mix the action of a classic arcade shooter with the strategy of a table game as dots and boxes.

There will be enemies with different shapes but, the area bosses are 10 times bigger than the player spaceship, every boss represent a constellation from the book Almagesto written by Ptolomeo.

name: Royal Match
description:
Welcome to Royal Match, the king of puzzle games! Swipe colors, solve match-3 puzzles and help King Robert decorate his castle. An exciting adventure is calling you!

We have thousands of challenging match-3 levels for you to play in the Royal Arena! On this fun journey, you will solve exciting puzzles, receive coins for unlocking new areas, decorate King Robert’s castle and get extra boosters to continue your saga. Also you can compete with millions of players in events such as King's Cup, Sky Race, Team Battle, Lightning Rush and claim exciting rewards for your achievements. Fun and challenge never ends and you will never have a dull moment in Royal Match.

name: Town of Us
description: Town Of Us is a mod for Among Us that adds brand new roles into the game, all with unique abilities.

name: Kemono Friends: Cellien May Cry
description: A fanfic game of "Kemono Friends". Hack and slash action RPG. You can summon Friends and fight together. There are more than 30 Friends. There are more than 60 types of enemies. There are 4 levels of difficulty, so even people who are not good at action games can enjoy it.

name: Moving Out: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Become a removals master with the Moving Out Deluxe Edition! In this edition you will receive:
- Moving Out
- Employees of the Month Pack
- Movers in Paradise
- Moving Out Original Soundtrack

name: Double Cheeseburger, Medium Fries
description: Learn how fun working on your day off can be!

name: Counter Fight Ichiran
description: Cook some knockout noodles! "Counter Fight Ichiran" is an all-new cooking game made with input from popular ramen store, Ichiran. Ichiran is a famous organic tonkotsu ramen chain with 85 outlets in Japan, often touted as a "must-try cuisine" for tourists. Fulfill orders to get a high score!

name: Hidden Memory: Neko's Life
description: Follow a cute stray kitten journey until he finds a home and use the opportunity to disconnect from the world with this beautiful and relaxing minimalist puzzle!

name: Portals World
description: A sci-fi action strategy tower defense digging 2D top down game, Dig, explore, build production and defensive facilities, take care of robot's battery and manage power wisely..

name: Push the Box 3D
description: This game is based on Sokoban in 3D with new mechanics and puzzles.

name: Save the Pirate: Sea Story
description: An adventure game with logic challenges about a funny pirate

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII: Scenario - The Rise of Cao Cao & Event Set
description: Cao Cao and Lu Bu battled at Zhongyuan, and the defeated Lu Bu was forced to fall back and seek the aid of Liu Bei in Xu. At Jiangdong, Sun Ce expanded his forces with an all-out attack. Meanwhile, as Li Jue, Guo Si, and other remnants of Dong Zhuo's force were disputing one another, Emperor Xian fled from Chang'an and returned to...

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms XIII EP: Scenario for War Chronicles Mode - 2nd Wave: Clash of the Warmongers
description: An additional scenario for the War Chronicles mode of the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

name: TowerMancer
description: TowerMancer, a strategy tower building game. Gather resources, build rooms, face menacing threats and meet The Lich family!

name: Refrigerant Recovery Simulation
description: Recover, Pressure Test, Evacuate, Charge - watch a detailed process in 3D and then try it yourself hands-on using this fully interactive tool.

name: ~府城少女~ 以妳為名的府城情書
description: Sin descripción

name: 大头侏罗纪
description: An indie game based on dinosaurs. Players need to search through the dungeon for dragon eggs, hatch dinosaurs, build their own equipment, and finally defeat all the bosses to win.

name: Conspiracy Girls
description: Conspiracy Girls is a short visual novel about cute and funny girls who around exposing conspiracies, and get into all sorts of trouble doing so!

name: Escape the Ordinary: Tales of Romina Manor
description: Based on the escape room board game of the same name. Discover the mystery of Romina Manor as you investigate the disappearance of the Master by searching for clues and solving puzzles in locations like the Parlor, Kitchen or even the Observatory.

name: TAL: Arctic 4
description: This is a game in which you have to help an unknown creature to go to a magical portal through many mazes.

name: Crazy Flasher Series 2021
description: The classic flash game series CrazyFlasher, which used to accompany young people, is packed by its author Andy law and uploaded to the world - famous game platform steam, which is convenient for players to collect.

name: Fantasy Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Gaggle Brains!
description: Gaggle Brains! is a short puzzle game with 16 levels and simple controls. Steer your crowd of procedurally animated, physics driven humans, past multiple hordes of zombies - try to get as many past the finish line as possible.

name: Sea of Blood
description: The world is withering away! Someone must find the source and plug it before it is too late. As a brand new adventurer, set out on an Old-School adventure in this diverse fantasy world, and become the vanquisher of evil.

name: All-In-One Sports VR
description: 10 Sports in 1 Game ! What type of sports acitivities will be safer during the pandemic era? All in One sports VR offers the most safe way to keep you healthy for both physically and mentally with zero contact.

name: Horror Bar VR
description: Horror Bar is an incredibly engaging Zombie Bar simulator where you can take on the role of bartender and serve your scarily nice customers multiple crazy dishes and drinks.

name: MultiMind Challengers
description: MultiMind Challengers is a 2D soulslike action RPG with a unique system and universe. Adapt and fight to survive in the biosphere turned into a multiminded invasion.

name: Collisus
description: Collisus will be the Ultimate Gun-Fu Simulator with a 2.5D Gun-Fu system as the marvel of this game developed to perfection to set a standard never seen before in shooters.

name: A Knight Never Yields
description: Navigate depths of old dungeon full of deadly traps without using your eye sight. Help young apprentice fulfill his destiny of becoming a Blind Knight while relying only on your sense of rhythm and memory.

name: Codebreaker Puzzle 1000! ENG & JAN
description: Fill in specified characters to same number blanks to complete all words in puzzle. Content 2000 questions in 4 level difficulty. (each 1000 questions for both English and Japanese)

name: Bricks Pinball V
description: Bricks Pinball is a brick breaker game which combines the game mechanics of a traditional brick breaker and a flipper game. Play through 15 exciting levels as you aim for a high score.

name: Arcade Archives: Guerrilla War
description: Guerrilla War is a survival shooting game released by SNK in 1987. Take control of a rebel leader and fight to take back your country from dictatorship. Use powerful weapons such as hand grenades and tanks to defeat the enemy and reclaim your country.

name: Save Navelnii
description: A linear third person shooter.

name: Tiny Traffic
description: Tiny Traffic is a relaxing turn-based puzzle game about re-directing the flow of traffic, in order to safely park all cars. There's no timer or score to distract you from getting lost in the puzzles.

name: Minna no Tsume Shogi Chuukyuu-hen 1
description:
The first in the Tsume Shogi series for everyone! All 500 questions of Tsume Shogi for beginners to intermediates Tsume Shogi problem collection equipped with the latest AI dedicated to Tsume Shogi!

■ Easy to play even for beginners! Even those who have never solved the problem of Tsume Shogi or who do not know the rules of Shogi are safe. In "Introduction to Tsume Shogi for Everyone", we have prepared an easy-to-understand explanation of the rules of Tsume Shogi, and also prepared shogi pieces for beginners that describe how to move the pieces. In addition, we have prepared a lot of problems for beginners, so don't be afraid to try this deep shogi puzzle!

■ Equipped with the latest AI dedicated to Tsume Shogi Since it is equipped with a dedicated AI, the AI ​​will respond firmly even if you point to a hand other than the correct answer procedure. By continuing to point to Tsume Shogi until the end, you can understand why it is incorrect.

■ One-handed, three-handed, and five-handed shogi are all 500. With the cooperation of the "Tsume Shogi Telling Grandchildren", a wide range of carefully selected 500 questions are prepared by a team of versatile tsume shogi writers.

name: Dariusburst: Another Chronicle EX+
description:
Taito's Darius series began with the titular arcade game, Darius, in 1986 and comprises numerous side-scrolling shooting games released in arcades, many of which were later ported to game consoles.
This game is a port of the 2010 arcade game, DariusBurst Another Chronicle EX, including the final update and exclusive new features for this version.
It adds the previously omitted Event Mode, with brand new events too, and also includes the Murakumo ship, playable across all modes.

name: AEW Casino: Double or Nothing
description: Sin descripción

name: The Five Covens
description:
In the land of Gaarth there are five families of warlocks, each with its own unique ability. Our character is a young witch belonging to the family that dominates levitation. The villain seeks to control the other powers to establish himself as absolute ruler. To this end, she invites our character to her castle with the premise of a celebration by way of deception. At the entrance she is arrested. She wakes up in a dungeon and must find a way to escape using her abilities. At all times we will be supported by our inseparable companion, the raven.

To face the challenges of the dungeons, including enemies and puzzles of all kinds, Brenda will strengthen herself before her final battle against the evil leader Kenot.

name: Radon Blast
description:
Break bricks by using the ball. Get items like bonus, speed and multiple balls to make the game more challenging. If you hit the force wall multiple times it will be destroyed so you can reach the next stage. If you miss a ball you go back to the previous stage. But hurry up, you only have seconds before the ball explodes.

Radon Blast is full packed with randomly sorted stages. An increasing ball speed makes it even more challenging. Jump between stages, collect bonus multipliers to get higher scores.

name: Vertical Shift
description:
A VR Esport unlike any other. Fly through the arenas equipped with your Zenith Suit, an advanced movement system. Your Zenith Suit is equipped with Grapple Hooks, Jet Packs, and Gliders, giving you ultimate control over your flight.

Vertical Shift also features a single-player campaign! Explore the City of Orion, a futuristic metropolis on the brink of collapse. Join the resistance and help take down the evil government through a variety of missions and activities. Or just swing around and take in the sights!

name: Crashland
description:
CRASHLAND is a VR action horror game set on a hostile alien planet. You play as an intergalactic gladiator who is crashlanding and trying to survive until rescue. Combat in CRASHLAND is fast, vicious, and brutal. You will fight giant hellworms in the desert, terror birds in the forest, scorpions in the mist and spiders in the dark. There is nowhere to hide.

You will need to master your pistol, boomstick, scanner and teleporter to survive. New firing modes and powerups will drop during missions. By gaining XP you can level up, unlock perks, and radically alter how the game plays.

Features:
- Fast visceral combat against over 50 vicious and deadly creatures.
- 24 unique missions across desert, forest, and mountain biomes.
- Advanced procedural animation technology that helps bring the virtual creatures to life.
- Weather effects like howling winds, rain, thunder and snow.
- 30 perks to unlock including teleport punch, slow time, and turrets.
- Local, friend and galactic leaderboards.

name: City Maker
description: City Maker is a cross between a city builder and a puzzle game, with endless replay-ability! Try to keep your citizens happy while managing spending but most importantly try to stay mayor as long as possible. City Maker offers engaging city building mechanics with unique challenges to test your city making abilities. Don't forget to check out other players' cities in the "city gallery"!

name: The Lost Cube
description: The Lost Cube is a challenging platformer which takes inspiration from classic titles such as Super Meat Boy and Celeste. The story unravels in a small village nestled somewhere in northern Europe. Each day, a special melody is played upon a magical guitar bringing prosperity upon the land.

name: GunSoul Girl
description: This is a first-person shooter game, you will accompany the young girl, challenge all kinds of secrets, get weapons, destroy the polluted enemies in the secret. Unlock memories.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Season Two
description: The end begins. It’s a jungle out there. Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Season 2 takes players to the rainforests of Laos, where Woods and his strike team have tracked down Perseus through a vast cartel network. Drop in with the newest in Cold War guerrilla gear, including new weapons, Operator Skins, Legendary Blueprints, and more.

name: Room to Grow
description: Tackle thorny problems in this plant pushing puzzle game. Learn to maneuver like a cactus as you grow your way back to the desert!

name: Moving Out: Movers in Paradise
description: Movers in Paradise is an expansion via DLC for all supported platforms, which added 14 new story levels, four new movers, and 10 new arcade levels.

name: Slow Damage
description:
Slow Damage takes place at some point during the 21st century in the fictional ward of Shinkomi, which is located in Tokyo, Japan and was previously a part of the Tokyo Bay City No. 13 subregion. The country is in the midst of a recession and, in an attempt to resolve these economic troubles, the government repurposed this area as a large-scale casino resort due to its historic prosperity. This ward is governed by the corrupt Takasato Group whose only interest is their own financial gain.

The story follows Towa, a resident of Shinkoumi who lives his life in a carefree and apathetic manner, showing no concern for his future. The only thing that captures his interest is painting—more specifically, painting the innermost desires of other people.

name: A Wake Inn
description: Put your VR goggles on to explore dark corridors of an abandoned hotel using realistically controlled wheelchair, and face strange army of living dolls. But you won't be alone - mysterious voice will accompany you via shortwave transmitter. Just make sure, who really pulls the strings in this world.

name: Infinite Versus
description: Experience the ultimate triad of high-speed gameplay, hitch-free online battles with zero-input delay, and unmatched mod support. Infinite Versus operates with the new Blitz Netcode and provides full mod support for stories, stages, assists, audio, & characters. Your next battle awaits!

name: Sentience
description: Sentience is a multiplayer stealth game in a sci-fi cyberpunk dystopian Earth. Take on the role of a Sentinel to quell resistance, or become a newly-sentient Rogue to complete tasks and take down the system.

name: New Witch in Town
description: Save your magical forest, uncover old mysteries, and make new friends in this Young Adult urban fantasy game!

name: Fear surrounds
description: 3D horror version of the werewolf kill. 2 evil spirits possessed by the body hidden in you, before the evil spirit kill all good people to complete the task, or find out the evil spirit to sacrifice to end the dream.

name: Waifu's Spooky Space Station
description:
The WSS space station was once one of humanity's best-known academy for idols and super stars . But nowadays it is just a place where myths and spooky stories are made.

In Waifu's Spooky Space Station you will have the opportunity to wander through the hundreds of modules of the labyrinthine WSS and discover its secrets and mysteries. But be careful! There are rumors that says the station is cursed and inhabited by the most chilling beings...

name: Aery: A Journey Beyond Time
description:
In Aery – A Journey Beyond Time you are in the role of a flying god-like creature which observes the world and their inhabitants while they grow and evolve.

You can quite literally fly through history and the different stages of human development, follow an interesting story through time, and enjoy the speed of flying at the same time.

This story-driven game is non-violent so that you can enjoy the intuitive and relaxing gameplay in 12 different stages of the development of our earth.

name: The Catch: Carp & Coarse - Collector's Edition
description: The Catch: Carp & Coarse Collector's Edition contains not only the core experience but also Jezioro Bestii and the Lake Beasts Equipment Pack for one great price!

name: Twin Stick Heroes
description:
In Twin Stick Heroes you take control of an oddball group of "heroes" duking it out for ultimate glory! Matches are fast and intense, every second can either mean your victory or demise, so you may have to be a little creative to come out on top.

All 19 heroes vastly change gameplay, each and every one is equipped with a unique weapon or ability focusing on a certain playstyle. Sniping players across map with a bow and arrow or going in close with a dart gun can be just as effective as laying traps or hiding in plain sight as Ghost.

Controls are tight and responsive meaning that no matter how slow or fast your HERO is you'll always have a way out of most situations.

The core fighting mechanics are easy enough for any new player, but has enough depth to draw veterans of the twin stick shooter genre, with a huge amount of heroes and items to choose from, as well as a large variety of gameplay altering variants, modes, maps, and settings to play around with.

Many people may describe this game as a multiplayer bullet hell, but with the vast armament and tools given to the player the winner is most likely the one who is the most creative not necessarily the one with the fastest finger.

name: Story of Seasons: Pioneers of Olive Town - Premium Edition
description: The Story of Season: Pioneers of Olive Town Premium Edition comes with a cute buffalo pocket plushie alongside a large cloth poster containing the game’s key art.

name: Story of Seasons: Pioneers of Olive Town - Deluxe Edition
description:
Deluxe Edition includes:

- Story of seasons: pioneers of olive town Nintendo Switch game
- A5 notebook containing 140 pages
- 10x trading cards featuring marriage Candidates
- A3 poster featuring exclusive artwork from Igusa Matsuyama
- Collector's box featuring exclusive artwork from Igusa Matsuyama

name: Jinki Resurrection: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following
Game: Jinki Resurrection,
Original Soundtrack,
Acrylic key chain,
Mini Illustration,
B2 Tapestry

name: Kin'iro Loveriche: Golden Time - Limited Edition
description: This is the fandisc for "Kin'iro Loveriche" with after stories for each of the five heroines. There are also new routes for Ayaka and Caminal.

name: Kin'iro Loveriche: Golden Time
description: This is the fandisc for "Kin'iro Loveriche" with after stories for each of the five heroines. There are also new routes for Ayaka and Caminal.

name: Jinki Resurrection
description: Jinki Resurrection is a Japanese 18+rated visual novel eroge and the second game for the PC consoles.

name: Kemco RPG Selection Vol. 6
description: Kemco RPG Selection Vol. 6 is a bundle of multiple games in the J-RPG genre.

name: Story of Seasons: Pioneers of Olive Town
description: The long-awaited brand new entry in the original farm/life simulation franchise, known in Japan as Bokujo Monogatari, makes its debut on Nintendo Switch, bringing players more freedom than ever before to shape an untamed wilderness and customize their farm down to the very tile. A new cast of marriage candidates, a town that grows and thrives along with your farm, and a request system highlight the new features, all while retaining the core elements of the STORY OF SEASONS series. Finding Earth Sprites while exploring your farmland may lead you to mysterious, fantastical lands such as gardens where the seasons never change, an island in the sky, or even the inside of a volcano!

name: Cotton Reboot!
description: Suddenly one day, the waves of darkness messed up the prism of light and began to inhale the light of the world. Then the night went on, the morning light was lost, and people were living anxious lives in the dark. On the other hand, the gluttonous wizard Cotton, who is completely indifferent to such things, does not know the request from Fairy Silk. However, when I heard that I could get my favorite Willow when I got rid of the monsters, it was so glittering! Anyway, the journey to explore Cotton Willow begins.

name: Darius: Cozmic Revelation - Collector's Edition
description:
A sequel to the Cozmic Collection, Darius Cozmic Revelation was released for PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch on February 25, 2021 in Japan, containing the games G-Darius HD and Dariusburst: Another Chronicle EX+. The western release will contain the Game Boy version of Sagaia as a bonus on the cartridge. A future update also adds G-Darius Ver. 2 to the compilation.

Included with the Famistu DX Pack of Cozmic Revelations - Special Edition is a packaged copy of Darius: Extra Version, released for the Sega Mega Drive in 2020.

The Collector's Edition contains:
- Darius Cozmic Revelation Game for Nintendo Switch
- Collector’s box with magnetic latch
- Darius PCB Box
- DARIUSBURST ANOTHER CHRONICLE Live in O-EAST -revolt- Blu-ray with Zuntata bonus feature by Audi Sorlie and John Linneman.
- Arcade Papercraft
- Hardcover Artbook (localised in English)
- 4 Acrylic Art Cards
- PVC Standee
- DARIUS THE OMNIBUS III Arrange CD
- Darius Revelation Pin

name: Darius Cozmic Revelation
